summary: 5 white kids get lost in the hood looking for da hip hop witch, a year later their footage was found.
cast: Eminem|Ja Rule|Pras Michel|Vanilla Ice|Rah Digga|Mobb Deep|Charli Baltimore|Dale Resteghini|Spliff Starr|Stacii Jae Johnson|Vitamin C|Mia Tyler|Amy Dorris|Benzino|Jonathan Martin|Rockness Monsta|Michelle Bernard
keywords: hip hop|white rapper|telephone call|breaking the fourth wall|victim
title: El proyecto de la Bruja del Hip Hop
